channel.title: Comments on: Too much coffee, man! Or trying to understand high activity in children and severe mood swings in adulthood. With help from Deep Purple, Keith Moon, Kay Redfield Jamison, and Too Much Coffee Man!
channel.description: Supporting children's language, communication and learning

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Thank you Eileen! Don't you just want to take a pair of scissors to Ian Gillan's hair and give it a bit of 'shape'?!? Best wishes from Michael
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Eileen!
Don’t you just want to take a pair of scissors to Ian Gillan’s hair and give it a bit of ‘shape’?!?
Best wishes from Michael

item.title: By: Eileen

item.description: Insightful, interesting, useful with fun references to my teenage years....
